#include <iostream>
//#include<stdio.h>
#include<math.h>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	// your code goes here
    long int t,n,m,sum;
    cin>>t;
    for(long int i=0;i<t;i++){
        cin>>n;
        m=n;
        sum=0;
        while(n>0){
            sum+=n%10;
            n=n/10;
        }
        cout<<m%sum<<endl;
    }
	return 0;
}
